blurb.en: Talofa lava friends, thanks for considering this invitation. My role is to come up with ideas and pass them on to the rest of the team and hope they can make it happen! haha I‚Äôm really excited to be a part of this virtual event. If you have any questions‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ask Lasi! Haha But seriously I‚Äôd be more than happy to answer any questions you may have. I look forward to seeing you there!

blurb.en: Hi everyone, thank you for receiving our invitation. My role in the planning is to offer support and helpful suggestions in planning the event to make sure things go smoothly. Please feel free to contact me with any questions at the email address provided. We hope to see your beautiful faces there!!

blurb.en: Greetings to all you lovely ones! My main role in this wonderful event is to try to be there for my fellow teammates in whatever is needed. If you are thinking about submitting an item and you may have any questions regarding ideas or general help, please feel free to contact me and/or any of our other committee members. Hopefully I will get to meet and see many of your smiley faces, and if you plan on coming, I hope you have loads of timeless fun! Thank You üòä

blurb.en:
Talofa lava friends! You can call me Lasi and I'll be working to help facilitate the evening. My roles in contributing to this wonderful evening include building this website, being an ideas guy and generally helping wherever I can :) I look forward to meeting you all the night of our Fiafia, stay safe until we meet!!!

Take care brothers and sisters (^-^)/

blurb.en: Kia ora everyone, my name is Freida. I am here for moral support and to gather items so if you are keen please let us know üëç I am very excited to see what amazing ideas and items flow through so have fun with it....this is all for the enjoyment of our close friends and families as we all know we need encouragement during these times. Can't wait to see all your beautiful faces!

blurb.en: Hello friends! Thanks for clicking on my face, everyone calls me Annie. I am the main video editor, meaning I do minor edits, such as audio/colour correction but only if need be. Feel free to edit your videos if you like (thanks in advance for making my job easier :D). If you ever need anything, or have any questions that aren‚Äôt already answered on the website, you can contact us via our shared email: thenightbeforeproductions@gmail.com. Even better, if you know one of us, send us a message! Warm Christian love to you all!!

blurb.en: Talofa everybody, I am Lasi, Freida and Annies mom. That's my contribution to this project. If you need anything or have any questions please ask the committee. I'm here to fill the gap on the website. Come and join us on the night.
